mapper.insert: insert into vocabulary.voc_dic (eng_voc_id, mon_voc_id, user_id) values(#{eng_id}, #{mon_id}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select dic.dic_id, eng.voc_id as eng_id, eng.voc_word as eng_word, eng.voc_id as mon_id, mon.voc_word as mon_word, date_format(dic.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, date_format(dic.reg_date, '%m-%d') as reg_month_day from vocabulary.voc_dic dic left join vocabulary.voc_eng eng on (dic.eng_voc_id = eng.voc_id) left join vocabulary.voc_mon mon on (dic.mon_voc_id = mon.voc_id) where dic.user_id = #{id} order by reg_date desc, dic_id asc;
